description: This file defines a ProfileProvider class for managing user profile data, including fetching and updating profile information. It utilizes Flutter's ChangeNotifier to notify listeners of state changes and interacts with an API client.

classes.name: ProfileProvider
classes.description: A provider class extending ChangeNotifier that manages user profile state, including loading user data and handling errors.

methods.name: fetchProfile
methods.description: Fetches the user profile from the API and updates internal state.

methods.name: updateProfile
methods.description: Updates the user profile with given data via an API request and updates internal state.
